actions.description: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack and one Constrict or Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sea serpent can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The sea serpent exhales a 30-foot cone of cold. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Rime Breath (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
